channel.title: Cross-Platform on Arrans github.io

item.title: flameshot-org/flameshot
item.description: Powerful yet simple to use screenshot software 🖥️ 📸

item.description: Cross platform GUI toolkit in Go inspired by Material Design

item.title: TheZoraiz/ascii-image-converter
item.description: A cross-platform command-line tool to convert images into ascii art and print them on the console. Now supports braille art!

item.description: 💥 Blazing fast terminal file manager written in Rust, based on async I/O.

item.description: An awesome list that curates the best Flutter libraries, tools, tutorials, articles and more.

item.description: Windows/macOS/Linux GUI client for GIT users

item.description: Secure, cross-platform Git credential storage with authentication to GitHub, Azure Repos, and other popular Git hosting services.

item.description: Cross-platform application for easy encrypted file, folder, and text sharing between devices.

item.title: Kareadita/Kavita
item.description: Kavita is a fast, feature rich, cross platform reading server. Built with the goal of being a full solution for all your reading needs. Setup your own server and share your reading collection with your friends and family.

item.title: spacedriveapp/spacedrive
item.description: Spacedrive is an open source cross-platform file explorer, powered by a virtual distributed filesystem written in Rust.

item.title: dweymouth/supersonic
item.description: A lightweight and full-featured cross-platform desktop client for self-hosted music servers

item.title: sandrohanea/whisper.net
item.description: Whisper.net. Speech to text made simple using Whisper Models

item.title: Lymphatus/caesium-image-compressor
item.description: Caesium is an image compression software that helps you store, send and share digital pictures, supporting JPG, PNG, WebP and TIFF formats. You can quickly reduce the file size (and resolution, if you want) by preserving the overall quality of the image.

item.title: adrg/xdg
item.description: Go implementation of the XDG Base Directory Specification and XDG user directories

item.title: xyproto/algernon
item.description: Small self-contained pure-Go web server with Lua, Teal, Markdown, Ollama, HTTP/2, QUIC, Redis, SQLite and PostgreSQL support ++

item.description: Flutter on Windows, MacOS and Linux - based on Flutter Embedding, Go and GLFW.
